title: Fallout 4

notes: The player is very difficult to control because the mouselook speed accelerates.  For example, slowly looking from left to right will start slow but accelerate into rapid rotation.  Audio does not play outside of cutscenes.  Closing to desktop from gameplay causes the game to hang, requiring the process to be killed.  Exiting from gameplay to the main menu and then closing to desktop works as expected.

title: Fallout 4

notes: Adding bBackgroundMouse=1 to ini files, installing "xact" with winetricks and disabling Esync is required for game to start. title: Fallout 4

notes: I've done the mouse fix, Audio fix (running xact or setting xaudio_6 & 7 to native or native, builtin). Only issue I have is Audio will die. Explosions, Gun Shots, Rain, Entering a building will kill audio. Once Audio dies (or even just loops) npcs will no longer respond to interactions.
title: Fallout 4

notes:
bBackgroundMouse=1 added to FalloutCustom.ini located at home/[YOUR USERNAME]/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/My Games/Fallout4/
Thx to Breadland @ Reddit for .ini location
Game run flawlessly in high setting, more than 60fps

title: Fallout 4

notes: I also added xaudio 2.7 using winecfg   WINEARCH=win64 WINEPREFIX='/path/to/steam/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx' winecfg I also set "capture mouse in fullscreen" in winecfg as well. also needed to add "bBackgroundMouse=1" to the Fallout4.ini [Control] section. that file is located in the "path/to/steam/compdata/377160/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/My Games/Fallout 4" folder
title: Fallout 4

notes:
Has Stated before by others
Minor tweaks to get it going
Inside path/to/steam/compdata/377160/ use WINEPREFIX=$PWD/pfx winetricks and add xaudio 2.7 and set "capture mouse in fullscreen"
And add "bBackgroundMouse=1" to the Fallout4.ini
title: Fallout 4

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.19.0, 4.14.65-1-MANJARO, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes:
Like many others have mentioned, add "bBackgroundMouse=1" to the control section of your Fallout4.ini in <SteamDir>/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/My Games/Fallout4/Fallout4.ini

I also added xact and changed the audio driver to Pulse using winetricks (WINEPREFIX=<SteamDir>/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx winetricks). After that, everything works perfectly! FPS is solid, sound works perfect! No issues!
title: Fallout 4

notes:
Tweaks:
Ini files can be found here: ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/My Games/Fallout4/

Fix Mouse added bBackgroundMouse=1 to Fallout4.ini
Fix Horizontal line in certain lighting change bComputeShaderDeferredTiledLighting=1 to bComputeShaderDeferredTiledLighting=0

#1 Install winetricks 
sudo apt-get install winetricks 

#2 Install xact 
WINEPREFIX=$HOME/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx winetricks --force xact 

#3 Run wine config 
WINEPREFIX=$HOME/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx winecfg 

#4 Create xaudio overrides Click on the Libraries tab to create overrides for the properties xaudio2_6 and xaudio2_7 and set them both to native
title: Fallout 4

gpu: NVIDIA Corporation GeForce GTX 650 Ti BOOST/PCIe/SSE2
notes: Performed the settings from, then it kinda runs: https://lutris.net/games/install/7504/view but crashes tomuch. D3D11 might be more stable, but then the game is to slow for my GPU.
title: Fallout 4

notes:
1) Add "bBackgroundMouse=1" to "Controls" section in file: ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/My Games/Fallout4/Fallout4.ini
======================================================================================
2)  Add "bComputeShaderDeferredTiledLighting=0" to "Display" section in same file
======================================================================================
3) Run in bash console (if you use proton 3.16):
==================bash=shell===============================================================
export WINEPREFIX=$HOME/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/377160/pfx;
export WINE=$HOME/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Proton\ 3.16/dist/bin/wine;
winetricks --force xact;
$HOME/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Proton\ 3.16/dist/bin/wine winecfg
==================end=================================================================
in config window set libraries "xaudio2_6" and "xaudio2_7" to native.
